msg: Adopted AI-DEV framework: taskmaster.py, state/, prompts/, KB/ migrated into project. All 35 plan tasks from v4 already complete.
FW-001 done. Added unattended execution directive to CLAUDE.md + CLEANUP-001 task to roadmap. Starting WIRE phase.
WIRE-001 done. GutFeeling wired into loop (startup seed, per-cycle update, attention charge, system prompt injection, /status). relevance.py emotional_alignment accepts gut value directly.
KB_03_cognitive_loop.md updated with gut feeling integration section.
WIRE-002 done. BootstrapReadiness wired into loop: persistent instance, check_all at startup + after flush, bootstrap prompt injected into system prompt, /readiness uses persistent instance.
KB_03_cognitive_loop.md updated with bootstrap readiness integration section.
WIRE-003 done. OutcomeTracker wired: gate decisions recorded in exit flush, promotions recorded in consolidation, gut deltas forward-linked to outcomes.
KB_03_cognitive_loop.md updated with OutcomeTracker integration section.
PERIPH-001 code complete. Built peripheral architecture: unified input_queue, StdinPeripheral, TelegramPeripheral (raw httpx, long polling, owner-only auth), reply_fn routing in cognitive loop.
Fixed Docker image name typo in docker-compose.yml: intuititive-identity-ai -> intuitive-ai (commit 0f04799)
Fixed missing logs directory crash: added (AGENT_HOME/'logs').mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True) in main.py (commit 0f04799)
Fixed empty query crash in context_assembly.py: _get_situational_memories now returns [] when query_text is empty instead of passing query='' to search_hybrid (commit 130f26e)
Fixed Telegram offset reset: after dropping pending updates, set offset=last_id+1 instead of 0 (commit 130f26e)
D-005: Peripheral architecture uses shared asyncio.Queue + reply_fn callbacks. D-006: Telegram uses raw httpx (no framework dep), long polling, owner-only auth.
Created KB_04_peripherals.md. Updated KB_01 module map with stdin_peripheral.py and telegram_peripheral.py.

summary: Fixed stdin peripheral thread pool exhaustion: run_in_executor spawned a new thread per 1s timeout, exhausting default pool (32 threads) and starving event loop. Replaced with single persistent reader thread + asyncio bridge queue.

Telegram peripheral verified end-to-end: message received via getUpdates, won attention (salience=0.470), context assembled, System 1 responded, reply sent via sendMessage in ~2s. DMN continued thinking between user messages.
Updated KB_04_peripherals.md with stdin thread safety note.
Session H: Fixed stdin thread leak, deployed to norisor, verified Telegram works end-to-end. PERIPH-001 DONE. Next: TEST-001.
Dashboard implemented: src/dashboard.py (AgentState, SSE broadcast, REST API, inline dark-theme frontend). aiohttp web server at port 8080.
Wired dashboard into cognitive loop: agent_state param, shared conversation, 4 SSE events (cycle_start, llm_response, escalation, gate_flush). loop.py + main.py modified.
Created KB_05_dashboard.md. Updated KB_01 module map, KB_03 with dashboard integration section, KB_index.
Dashboard uses aiohttp (async-native, minimal dep), AgentState shared dataclass, SSE broadcast with per-subscriber asyncio.Queue, read-only memory access via direct pool.fetch().
